events.message: I filed a claim after my car was involved in a collision on Main Street yesterday afternoon.
The claim has been categorized under auto accident following the review of the initial report.
An agent was assigned to manage the investigation and communication regarding my vehicle accident claim.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of my auto accident claim and assured prompt follow up.
I received a request for police reports and photos of the damaged vehicle to proceed with the claim evaluation.
All required documents, including accident photos and police report, were uploaded to the claim portal successfully.
The investigation team has started reviewing all submitted evidence to determine the liability and damages.
Investigation was completed after thorough verification of the accident circumstances and vehicle condition.
A settlement offer was proposed based on the damage assessment and policy terms related to my car accident.
I responded positively to the proposed settlement, appreciating the fairness and promptness of the offer.
The claim was approved officially, confirming coverage and authorizing the damages payment for my vehicle.
Payment for the approved claim was issued today and should reflect in my bank account shortly.
The auto accident claim has been formally closed following successful settlement and payment disbursement.
The entire claim file has been archived for future reference in accordance with company record keeping policies.
